<MethodEndpoint

This updates the Report entity

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"description":"Id of the Report to be updated","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"x-ms-summary":"Report id to update"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
